movies.title: April 1, 2000
movies.plot: It is the year 2000 and the World Global Union is in charge, although other countries are allowed to elect their own government leaders, as long as they support the Union. When Austria's newly-elected president, played by Josef Meinrad, makes his inauguration speech he declares Austria independence and issues an edict ending Austria's financial support for the Global Union.

events.title: the day in the future Austria will be freed

movies.title: Children of Hiroshima
movies.plot: Shows the devastation caused by the atomic bomb, and by use of a fictional storyline, portrays the struggle of the ordinary Japanese people in dealing with the aftermath.

events.title: an atomic bomb is dropped on Hiroshima, killing tens of thousands and poisoning many more

movies.title: The Winning Team
movies.plot: Poor health and alcoholism force Grover Cleveland Alexander out of baseball, but through his wife's faithful efforts, he gets a chance for a comeback and redemption.

events.title: St. Louis Cardinals win game 7 and the series
